\logpage{[ 4, 2, 0 ]}
\hyperdef{L}{X87298423867F5682}{}
{
  

\subsection{\textcolor{Chapter }{Ordering (for IsPoset)}}
\logpage{[ 4, 2, 1 ]}\nobreak
\hyperdef{L}{X7F1EFF6284A84223}{}
{\noindent\textcolor{FuncColor}{$\triangleright$\ \ \texttt{Ordering({\mdseries\slshape X})\index{Ordering@\texttt{Ordering}!for IsPoset}
\label{Ordering:for IsPoset}
}\hfill{\scriptsize (operation)}}\\
\textbf{\indent Returns:\ }
a function computing the order of the poset $X$. 



 Ordering(X)(x,y) is the value of the expression $x\geq y$. }

 }
